title: Coordinate Geometry
quote: Explore the formulas and equations that shape the world of geometry.

questions.question: 01. What is the distance formula between two points (x₁, y₁) and (x₂, y₂)?
02. What is the slope of a line passing through points (x₁, y₁) and (x₂, y₂)?
03. What is the equation of a circle with center (h, k) and radius r?
04. What is the equation of a line in slope-intercept form?
05. If the distance of a point from the origin is 5, what is the equation?
